name: The 9th Int'l Conference on Protein and Proteomics
content: The 9th Int'l Conference on Protein and Proteomics (CPP 2024) will be held in Kunming, China, during May 28-30, 2024\. The aim of CPP is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their research results and development activities in Computational proteomics and bioinformatics, Disease proteomics, Functional proteomics, Metaproteomics, Molecular and cellular proteomics, Pharmaceutical proteomics, Protein chemistry, Protein chip, Protein networks and pathways, Structural proteomics, etc. CPP 2024 will be a valuable and important platform for inspiring international and interdisciplinary exchange at the forefront of Protein and Proteomics.
